Comparison of rsid vs chr:pos lookup in ElasticSearch

Gibran Hemani

Source: vignettes/timings.Rmd
timings.Rmd
library(knitr)
library(pander)
library(microbenchmark)
library(ieugwasr)
#> API: public: https://gwas-api.mrcieu.ac.uk/

Get a set of SNPs too query:

a <- tophits("ieu-a-2")
rsid <- a$rsid
chrpos <- paste0(a$chr, ":", a$position)
length(rsid)
#> [1] 79

1. Comparison of rsid lookup vs chromosome:position

mbm <- microbenchmark("rsid" = {
        b <- associations(rsid, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
    },
    "chrpos" = {
        b <- associations(chrpos, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
    }, times=10
)
kable(summary(mbm))
expr min lq mean median uq max neval
rsid 96.00377 103.2440 552.6163 373.5561 1133.998 1260.4475 10
chrpos 416.18348 511.6154 550.8324 543.4908 577.659 685.7309 10

2. Single range query

Specify a range, and then get the corresponding rsIDs in that range

radius <- 100000
chrpos <- paste0(a$chr[1], ":", a$position[1]-100000, "-", a$position[1]+100000)
b <- associations(chrpos, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
rsid <- b$rsid

This is a 210^{5} size window, which has 530 variants to lookup.

mbm <- microbenchmark("rsid" = {
        b <- associations(rsid, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
    },
    "chrpos" = {
        b <- associations(chrpos, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
    }, times=10
)
kable(summary(mbm))
expr min lq mean median uq max neval
rsid 190.1469 209.4475 246.3893 234.0893 269.2324 349.8974 10
chrpos 179.5993 190.0588 232.4721 228.3989 251.8106 368.9863 10

3. Multiple range queries

Specify multiple ranges, and then get the corresponding rsIDs across all those ranges

chrpos <- paste0(a$chr, ":", a$position-10000, "-", a$position+10000)
b <- associations(chrpos, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
rsid <- b$rsid

This 79 ranges of 210^{4} size window, which is covered by 4508 variants to lookup.

mbm <- microbenchmark("rsid" = {
        b <- associations(rsid, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
    },
    "chrpos" = {
        b <- associations(chrpos, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
    }, times=5
)
kable(summary(mbm))
expr min lq mean median uq max neval
rsid 1.477741 1.642348 1.691588 1.759426 1.773397 1.805031 5
chrpos 3.045796 3.127663 3.218500 3.197494 3.340778 3.380767 5
